sentence.Network_en: My mother had just died and I found the book very comforting.
sentence.Network_cn: 我母亲刚去世，我从这本书中获取了不少慰藉。

sentence.Network_en: In the midst of his feelings of impotence, a comforting thought arrived.
sentence.Network_cn: 正在他觉得很无奈的时候，一个令人欣慰的想法冒了出来。

sentence.Network_en: It is comforting to have a storehouse of treasured memories.
sentence.Network_cn: 拥有一座藏满了珍贵记忆的宝库真是令人欣慰。

entry.def: If you say that something is comforting, you mean it makes you feel less worried or unhappy.

example.ex: My mother had just died and I found the book very comforting...
example.tran: 我母亲刚去世，我从这本书中获取了不少慰藉。

example.ex: In the midst of his feelings of impotence, a comforting thought arrived.
example.tran: 正在他觉得很无奈的时候，一个令人欣慰的想法冒了出来。

auth_sentence.content: They are easy to make and comforting to eat.
auth_sentence.res_content: They are easy to make and comforting to eat.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: They are easy to make and comforting to eat.

auth_sentence.content: Instead of comforting her, he coldly rebuked her.
auth_sentence.res_content: Instead of comforting her, he coldly rebuked her.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Instead of comforting her, he coldly rebuked her.

auth_sentence.content: This is a comforting album full of surprises.
auth_sentence.res_content: This is a comforting album full of surprises.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: This is a comforting album full of surprises.

sentences.en: He gave his mother a comforting squeeze as he left.
sentences.cn: 他离开时给了母亲一个安慰的拥抱。

sentences.en: He just wants a comforting kiss and a cuddle and he’ll be all right.
sentences.cn: 他只想要别人安慰地吻他一下、抱他一下，这样他就会好起来。

sentences.en: His comforting words helped to sustain me in my faith during those dark days.
sentences.cn: 在那黑暗的日子里,他的安慰支持了我的信念。

sentences.en: It was a comforting thought that at least her father hadn’t suffered.
sentences.cn: 令人宽慰的是，至少她爸爸没有遭受痛苦。

sentences.en: She found his voice strangely comforting .
sentences.cn: 不知为何，她觉得他的声音让人感觉安慰。
